GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v6.0.17
GSD.description:
mm/mempolicy: fix memory leak in set_mempolicy_home_node system call

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.17 by commit 4ca0eb6b2f3add8c5daefb726ce57dc95d103d33, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit c6018b4b254971863bd0ad36bb5e7d0fa0f0ddb0. For more details please see the references link.
